name: Starboard (AG4W, Jackaan, Derfava, andreahlkvist, ChristianLindberg, Ljet, Jacob Didenbäck, kimcodekill)
name_original: Starboard (AG4W, Jackaan, Derfava, andreahlkvist, ChristianLindberg, Ljet, Jacob Didenbäck, kimcodekill)
description:
Starboard is a 4 vs 4 multiplayer action game. Take control of one of 4 unique characters and work together to defeat the other crew.

Pick your role, will you control the engine, steer, or control the weaponry?

Communicate with your friends by using the in-game voice lines

Score points by destroying the enemy ship or by capturing domination points.

Fix the ship when it gets damaged, pick up a repair kit and go to the broken component. Complete the task to heal the station/ship.

Reload the weapons by picking up an ammo kit and going to the empty weapon.

Have fun!
